snippet: The treatment of Holli, a female gorilla with a stomach abscess, offers an inside look at how the Bronx Zoo cares for animals who fall ill.
abstract: Surgical treatment and recovery of Holli, one of 18 gorillas at the Bronx Zoo, offer an unusual behind-the-scenes look at the zoo's health center, one of the most sophisticated animal medical facilities in the nation; Bronx Zoo, which is run by the Wildlife Conservation Society,  is a leader in conservation and zoo science.
lead_paragraph: The treatment of Holli, a female gorilla with a stomach abscess, offers an inside look at how the Bronx Zoo cares for animals who fall ill.

headline.seo: Ailing Occupants of the Bronx Zoo Get Sophisticated Medical Care
headline.main: The 180-Pound Gorilla in the Operating Room
headline.print_headline: The 180-Pound Gorilla in the Operating Room
